name: Alex E
text: Awesome game store! Some of the best customer service I’ve ever had along with fair prices. My wife and I traveled 45 minutes to check this store out and it was well worth the trip!

name: Benjamin Hall
text: The staff is kind and caring about their customers. They don't mind feedback in the nature of improving the overall experience of your visit. Customers are engaged and asked if they have any questions upon entering the facility. The selection is fairly good and plentiful. The inventory is intended to meet the needs of the products sold. I would recommend this store to any of my friends or gamers looking for a caring community to share in a traditional gaming experience.

name: Dan Logan
text: awesome people and great service!wont rip you off like some other gaming stores!

name: Laura Abernathy
text: These guys are super nice, very knowledgeable and it's a family oriented environment. I'd recommend them to anyone from beginner gamers to pros. They have great deals as well 👍👍

name: Jess Williams
text: Neal is amazing! Best place to buy and sell games and find novelty items.

name: Kenny Doby
text: The guys are always bomb super helpful and always very chill and cool highly recommend.

name: Judah Hollis
text: Great place to buy and trade at. Friendly customer service, and a ton of fun activities inside as well.

name: Mark Doty
text: Great selection of classic console games and friendly service!

name: Josh Layne
text: This place is awesome! I highly recommend anyone looking for classic games or consoles giving these guys a call. I was looking for an original Atari and they had multiple in stock. I was having a hard time finding one..They have a great selection of newer and older stuff for really good prices.

name: Deanedong doorbell
text: Very nice owner, great prices, and an overall good hangout place

name: MATTHEW STEPHENS
text: The very best gamer store I have ever went to best deals great quality service awesome people to talk to they're just good-hearted and good people

name: Miner Djherobrine
text: They always have something I'm looking for everytime I go by.

name: Bev W
text: Very helpful, friendly staff

name: Alvin Hunter Jr.
text: There nice people and they really try 2 help u the best they can. I will try 2 give them as much business as I can.

name: Danielle McKim
text: Nice guy. Good selection.

name: Martin Duarte
text: Good an..friendly customer service.

name: Joshua Burgans
text:
First time there, I look around for 30-40 minutes and find a couple games I wanted.  Go to check out and the employee says the prices marked on the games are no longer right, tries to look up the current prices online and charge me more than the sticker price.

Avoid.  99% of their inventory is overpriced filler junk anyway.  Cheaper to shop on eBay.

name: Charles
text:
It's a decent place to window shop but very pricey. The games did take me back to my childhood but I do think the prices could be a bit lower. I do understand they need to run a business and make profit although I do not want to go broke trying to relive some of my best memories. Also, try and add some music in the store.
Now, the lady behind the counter working there today was a gem. Loved talking to her!

name: Gus Dell
text: Awesome place to go. They have games from every console since Nintendo.

name: hey yo
text: Great little independent shop. Prices aren't too bad (obviously not as low as online shopping but convenience of closeness counts for something), and selection is surprisingly decent for an off the beaten path location. They have some gems. In particular the loose carts. If you dig around you'll find a classic you'll have to take home with you.

name: Robusthammer
text: Great owner! Neal is Awesome!

name: Christy Ethridge
text: This is a great place for vintage games in the Birmingham AL area.  They also have new games and gaming consoles.  My kids love it here!  Plus it's locally owned and operated which we appreciate as small business owners.

name: Dakota Duncan
text: Prices are good but a bit lacking in overall selection.

name: Tyler Startley
text: Ahhh

name: Janet Holloway
text: A great place to find old

name: dynamic kruzer
text: Great place and great people

name: Kurt Nilsson
text: This place is awesome! The people there are super nice and helpful, and they have a ton of rare and unique games. Plus they gave me WAAAY more for my games than anywhere else

name: Sherri Hoss
text: Great place lot's of good stuff love it

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Nice people. A little more expensive than and I'm only talking about $5 than Walmart, but I'd rather support a local small business.

name: Luke Bentley
text: Amazing people willing to reason the price, or just willingly cut it just because they like you, I've been there several times and love it, this place sold me a green n64 with a memory chip or whatever it is, a green controller to go with it, a gameboy advance sp, and several games, all at good prices

name: Jacob Stallings
text: Great staff nice atmosphere definitely going back

name: Matthew Lowry
text: Great prices and helpful

name: seven 7
text: Alright prices but Ida guy that wants a used console for less than the price i bought it for.

name: Jimmy Farley
text: Good guy

name: NeonShadow
text: 10/10 will visit again

name: Daniel Warden
text: This place gives you more cash or credit for your trades!!

name: David TM
text: It's ight

name: HeatherL
text: Prices for used products are a little pricey

name: Georgia Gay
text: Good prices

name: James Bradley
text: Friendly staff

name: Sherrie Townsend
text: Good

name: Haylee Salamon
text: The staff is super nice and gave me lots of free pens since I mentioned I was a server ! How nice.

name: Karen Lambert
text: Great variety of studios and stars. If my husband and I want a movie and don't want to wait on it to ship and all that mess I just go to emerald fantaseas. They do close too early to me. I would like to see a 24 hour store open somewhere around here

name: Theresa
text: Super helpful staff and a huge variety of merchandise. Great store!

name: Courtney
text: Knowledgeable about products, good prices, great customer service.

name: Nick Stallings
text: All items are of the cheapest quality. A five dollar pipe cost 20 bucks. To to it off employees wont let you just shop i felt very pressured

name: richard stanton
text: Is good to go  ifin you gots the money's

name: Patricia Lemar
text: Just went there with my husband. The girl working tonight, I think Michele, was awesome. She had lots of info on items we had questions about. More importantly, she was such a fun person to talk to. Really made it a great experience and we will be back.

name: Eric Compton
text: I spent 200 dollars on a wayer pipe and it broke when I cleaned it with rubbing alcohol.  The glass they sell is cheap, dont buy it. Go to sweet puff or vapor smoke shack if you want quality for cheap.  Everything in the store is half the price online. Gave it one star because zero isnt an option

name: L J
text: Wendy was such a great help to me. New to this and also trying to incorporate some other things. She was very polite and so helpful and knowledgeable. Will be back for sure. 👍

resp.text: Thank you..I no longer work there...I appreciate the kind words

name: Karen Lambert
text: Needs more variety of studios and outfits. Over half of their movies are Barracuda, not necessarily a bad studio but I know I would like to see them get digital playground and other big name studios. Staff has always been super helpful and courteous to me and my husband. Their lubes and supplements are super over priced in my opinion. They also have a variety of smoking accessories

name: Randall Olson
text:
The vibe is "rough". And the main answer to a product request is always..."We are sold out of that"? Which is understandable but they don't make any effort to be friendly and help any other way. It's like sorry we don't have that...see ya!

But I shop there a lot and I think spent $150.00 bucks in the last month and just settle for the customer service as it is.

name: Theresa
text: editing my review because this place has cleaned up and got a new manager Wendy. She was super helpful and sweet. Definitely going back now.

resp.text: Thank you..I no longer work there

name: Matt Winkles
text: This is the 2nd time I have bought a product from this store. Both products broke within a week and because all sales are final there's nothing that can be done. If you're in a pinch of say go here otherwise find your stuff online or at another location.  Also,  the customer service is pretty bad.  The pink haired girl behind the counter was annoyed by having to help customers.  She also lied about a product that cost me 30 dollars.

name: Zac Hightower
text: This place is terriable. I naught a product for my girlfriend. I opened it as soon as I got home. Product was damaged. I immediately brought it back and showed it to the cashier. I asked for an exchange. She called the owner and the own wouldn’t do the exchange. Don’t do business here. They sell junk and the owner will cheat you!!

name: Faye Broome
text: I am sorry about the phones. We have had trouble with them and other outage. All has been fixed. We are always happy to see you and everyone. Next time just come over. Our hours help you know that we are open.

name: Allen Grimes
text: Great selection, knowledgeable and courteous staff. Highly recommend!

name: Tammy Nance
text: Great store, professional staff, adult only shopping.

name: Marty Redmond
text: Arrived around 9:15 pm on a Friday night . Upon attempting entrance , the door was locked , without any employee in sight . However the sign clearly stated "OPEN" , although myself and multiple potential customers deduced that this "Gift Store" , does not do business .

name: Anthony Franco mr lol
text: I like what day sell there and they have really big thing  if you know what I mean

name: Divah Karma
text: Employee kick me and my service dog out of shop and was very rude to us...

name: Jessica
text: Product inside sealed package was broken, called owner, he said oh well, I'm not responsible after you purchase.
Do they sell poppers

name: John Staggs
text:
Me and my girl have made Enchantasys a regular part of our dating routine. The staff are amazingly helpful and eagerly match our curiosity, opening boxes and letting us sample the various toys, restraints, outfits, etc... We will often go in just to wander and let our minds do the rest. Enchantasys is a wonderful destination for everyone from seasoned kinksters to the blushing newbies.
I give it a full three thumbs up, 5 ⭐

name: Phil Hansen
text: Easily the nicest, cleanest, friendliest adult store in north Alabama. Attentive service but not overbearing. Well stocked, organized, and clean. And Meghan provided great customer service, I'll shop there just for her help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your recent visit and kind words.

name: Haley *
text:
Best adult store in Huntsville by far! The owner and her staff are astonishingly knowledgeable and they are the kindest people I’ve ever encountered!
The store is laid out beautifully and everything is well organized for your needs!
Super positive vibes and energy here as well while you shop! I can’t wait to come back!
Thank you Toni for everything!!!

resp.text: 🥰 Thank you so much! We appreciate you and we can't wait to see you again!

name: Elisa Hardy
text: The owner and cashier were amazing and even gave me a good bag being that I traveled over an hour to shop with them. Great vibes, they were extremely informative on everything I was looking for. If I’m ever back in Alabama or  Tennessee I’m definitely stopping by again!

name: Emily Motes
text:
Meghan was so so helpful in picking outfits that would look good on me and very knowledgeable with all the toys.
It feels very open, warm, and inviting!
I love the bedazzled PP they have named Pierre.

name: Cecil Sigman
text: I have been taken over, I use to frequent pleasures on university.  Till I visited Enchantasys, customer service great my wife redhead we resently met this young redhead who is very helpful, and beautiful .I'm like dam

name: JasonCat Partridge
text: These comments are amazing .... We're stopping by later because this is apparently the place to go for the good vibes and i even read they even have the great ones to . 👍

name: Kermit The Frog
text: Love the selection, atmosphere, and the ladies were extremely polite and helpful! Will do my business there forever!

resp.text: Thank you so very much! We enjoy shopping with our customers 😊

name: Becky W.
text: Not only was I impressed by the kind staff, but they were incredibly knowledgeable and offered additional ways to use the product I purchased. This only enhances the value of what I purchased!

name: スマタノオロチ
text:
(Translated by Google) The staff kindly told me about the shops that are not sold here because I can't speak English.
The staff here is great.

(Original)
英語ができない私にスタッフはここに売っていない物のお店を親切に教えて下さいました。
ここのスタッフは最高です。

name: Christen Payne
text: Great price and service! We have been grateful to have our AAA security system to feel protected! Their customer service and call center staff are so supportive and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: I really appreciate the feedback. Please call me if you need anything at all. Thanks and God bless

name: Vickey Ellison
text: Services my son's business. He is pleased with the service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I'm glad we could help ☺

name: Cynthia Forsman
text: Chris listened to what I needed and he delivered spot on! AAA Security will be who I call for any and all security needs. I would highly recommend them. Wish I could find painters this attentive!

resp.text: I appreciate the feedback. Please let me know if you need anything else. It was a pleasure working with you. God bless!

name: Trey Short
text: I love working with these guys. They are quick, efficient, and the systems that they put in a top-notch and high-quality. When all is said and done I will have four separate property secured by these guys.

resp.text: Again I appreciate the business. If you need anything at all let us know. Enjoyed working with you

name: Jeremy Acray
text: AAA has done several jobs for me over the last 15 years, both surveillance systems and security. They are currently helping me upgrade my home to become a more interactive “smart home.” They have always been very honest and dependable and stand  by their work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks again for the business. Let us know if you need anything else. Always here to help

name: Michael Rock
text: I'm a long term client & I highly recommend Chris & his team. A recent office move went smooth as could be with a solid, professional installation. Great customer service and a quality product, all at a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you Michael for your business. Been a pleasure working with you guys. Call me for anything else you need

I have been a customer with AAA Security for several years now, and I have been extremely satisfied with them.... Over the years, the service with AAA Security has been awesome!.... As a matter of fact, I think they should rename their company -  A+A+A+ Security..... Any time I have ever had any kind of problem, technical or otherwise, they were Promptly there to resolve the issue... I highly recommend this company for all security Needs.
Ray G.  Boaz, AL

text: First 'Bodega' now Hastings is leaving!? This place was great. You could rent movies, return them earlier, and get credit. After a while you would build enough credit to get free rentals which seemed like a great prize! Great movie, video game, book, and music collection! Now they're going out of business...

text: Really awesome store in the very rare chance they don't have what you are looking for they can order it within a few days for you and also they give the best deals on games I've ever seen in my life I just bought 8 movies and 5 PS3 games for 20 bucks

I never went here until they were closing for good, but there blow out sales were amazing! 60-80% off of everything was really nice while it lasted.

text: My little slice of heaven.

name: Kristopher Crump
text: Too bad it's gone, I liked looking around.

name: Savannah Hawkins
text: It's going out of business, so...

name: Brian Uthman
text: This store has everything and more!!! I can spend way too much time in here if I'm not careful.

name: Ninja K
text: My little slice of heaven.
